Class ArcAdapter

java.lang.Object
org.pneditor.petrinet.AbstractArc
org.pneditor.petrinet.adapters.lachguer.souissi.ArcAdapter
public class ArcAdapter extends org.pneditor.petrinet.AbstractArc
Adapter class for the `Arc` element in the PetriNet implementation. This class bridges the `Arc` implementation with the `AbstractArc` interface used by the PetriNet interface, enabling visualization and integration.

  • Constructor Details

    • ArcAdapter

      public ArcAdapter(org.pneditor.petrinet.AbstractNode source, org.pneditor.petrinet.AbstractNode destination)
      Constructor for ArcAdapter. Determines the type of arc based on source and destination and initializes it.
      Parameters:
      source - The source node of the arc.
      destination - The destination node of the arc.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the provided source and destination do not form a valid arc.
